item.title: CV & Bio
item.description: Here is a link to the latest version of my CV. A 1-page version is here. I am an economist with research interests in the fields of international macroeconomics and finance, (domestic) macroeconomics, and fiscal policy. Most of my recent research has focused on understanding sovereign default crises. Prior to coming to Notre Dame, I was an Assistant Professor of Economics at McMaster University (in Canada). At Notre Dame I teach macroeconomics at the undergraduate level and international economics at the graduate level.
